attributes.title: Not good at all🟠
attributes.review: Ok so first off I downloaded this to keep track of what our “define” President and the app took forever to download and right when I got in the app it kept glitching and making me go off the app and some weird nasty orange face just kept popping up all over and it was just very disturbing and I do not appreciate this horrible image and I would try and go on it to see what’s happening and my friends saw and they got really disturbed and just didn’t like it at all and i’m so glad that kids under 17 cannot go on here because if they saw this they could possibly die and have PTSD  but I’m also glad that adults over 17 can go on this app and write reviews that are completely 100% correct and they’re just talking about how they love the president like oh my God same man like don’t you just love a racist, sexist, nasty, homophobic, inconsiderate, president it’s just so amazing right? Yes I completely agree and that is exactly why I downloaded this horrible app that keeps glitching and showing me these horrible pictures although the only good thing about this app is that it tells me all of the horrible nasty disturbing things that our president does and that’s what I just love about this app because I love trump. (I am being very sarcastic if you couldn’t tell our president is horrible) And I just love the adults on here who are just being so rude and saying that kids don’t know anything about politics even though they probably know more than you do sir because you support trump and it’s just it’s just not OK so get your facts straight honey thank you

PLEASE FIX YOUR APP!

attributes.title: Worst Duck Meat EVER
attributes.review: Slowly, gradually, with great mental resistance but still inexorably, it dawned on me that I had paid $98 for a duck with almost no flavor. It was dry, too
